Text:
Prince_Dastan: If you download VLC player (Video LAN Classic) from here or somewhere else it will play almost any file format you throw at it; video, music, whatever.
I got annoyed with DivX not playing some types of movie format so tried VLC and have never looked back!
What you got to loose? ;)

Prince Datsan

Cheers Morphaeus08 for uploading these, much appreciated.
